meanings.definition: Actions taken in response to a previous movement.
meanings.sent1: The countermovements of the protesters were peaceful and organized.
meanings.sent2: The countermovements of the students aimed to bring about change.
meanings.sent3: The countermovements of the animals in the zoo made the visitors laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her countermovements in the dance competition were like a graceful ballet.
meanings.sent5: The countermovements of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Movements that oppose or counteract other movements.
meanings.sent1: The countermovements of the political party gained support from the public.
meanings.sent2: The countermovements of the rival team were fierce and strategic.
meanings.sent3: The countermovements of the clouds in the sky created interesting patterns.
meanings.sent4: His countermovements in the debate were like a skilled chess player.
meanings.sent5: The countermovements of the gears in the machine kept everything in balance.
